entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 60

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
